Name: Unsung Kingdom
About the game: Introduction The King is Dead. The Glory of the past can no longer be seen beyond the closed Gates of the Castle. The Kingdom came to an end with the Death of the Great King. - The History of Bellion This is the Story of the once glorious Kingdom of Bellion. Ann, a time traveler from the future, fights to save the King from his fate to die. System Short story RPG, with a simple and fast turn-based combat system.
